Text:
CREATE TABLE [Articles_21] (
    [Id] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [CreatedTime] datetimeoffset NOT NULL,
    [CreatedBy] nvarchar(250) NULL,
    [Rank] real NOT NULL,
    [Status] int NOT NULL,
    [CreatedTimeTicks] bigint NOT NULL,
    [Title] nvarchar(250) NOT NULL,
    [Descr] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [CategoryId] int NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_Articles_21] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Articles_21_Categories_CategoryId] FOREIGN KEY ([CategoryId]) REFERENCES [Categories] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
